title: Prepare a 13-Week Cash Flow Forecast
description: The treasurer needs a 13-week direct cash flow forecast to manage liquidity and plan for potential borrowing needs.

tasks.description: Forecast cash inflows by analyzing historical customer payment patterns and scheduled receipts.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a weekly forecast of cash receipts.

tasks.description: Forecast cash outflows by analyzing scheduled vendor payments, payroll runs, and other recurring expenses.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates a weekly forecast of cash disbursements.

tasks.description: Combine the inflow and outflow forecasts to create a comprehensive 13-week cash flow projection.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent produces a report showing the projected weekly cash balance and any potential shortfalls.
